name: AXELERA Process Performance Motors
description:
Introducing AXELERA Process Performance Motors , an Indigenous breakthrough innovation engineered to address the rigorous demands of modern-day industrial processes. Designed with advanced engineering and robust construction, AXELERA Motors provide exceptional performance, reliability, and energy-efficiency across diverse industrial environments. These motors are crafted to seamlessly integrate into operations worldwide, reducing long-term maintenance costs while enhancing productivity.

Holisticly brand sustainable solutions rather than clicks-and-mortar applications. Phosfluorescently whiteboard fully tested initiatives.

specifications.&nbsp; Durable, Rugged Construction: Built to withstand contamination, moisture, vibration, and harsh duty cycles, ensuring minimized maintenance and downtime.
specifications.&nbsp; High Torque Output: Optimized for efficiency under heavy loads, delivering reliable performance across demanding applications.
specifications.&nbsp;Advanced Sealing Technology: Prevents ingress of moisture, dust, and contaminants, extending motor lifespan.
specifications.&nbsp; Corrosion: Resistant Coatings: Provides enhanced durability even in corrosive environments.
specifications.&nbsp; Variable Speed Drive (VSD) Compat: Allows flexible speed control for versatileapplications and customization.
specifications.&nbsp; 360&deg; Rotatable Terminal Box: Offers flexible cable routing with incremental rotation fortailored installation.
specifications.&nbsp; Remote Monitoring &amp; Easy Repl: Common design footprint for seamless integration and simple motor replacements.

description:

Holisticly brand sustainable solutions rather than clicks-and-mortar applications. Phosfluorescently whiteboard fully tested initiatives.
features: Special Grade of laminations to reduce the Iron Loss Even at Partial Loads
Thicker conductors and more copper contents reduce copper loss due to lower resistance
Special design of fan and fan cover to reduce windage losses

specifications.Highest efficiency: Super premium efficiency of Apex series motor leads to more energy savings and reduces carbon emission.
specifications.Tested in India&rsquo;s only CSA approve: To keep regular check on instrumentation accuracy and testing procedure to ensure guaranteed efficiency our 7 test labs with 0.2 class instrumentation and torque transducers are approved by CSA under CPC program
specifications.Early payback: By maximizing energy savings you get quicker return on investments
specifications.Same output/Frame ratio: Lower efficiency motors can be replaced easily with Apex series IE4 motors as frame size is same
specifications.More reliable: Less bearing temperature ensures the extended life of motor. Hence Apex series motors are definitely a long term secured solution for the future.

name: DC Motors
description:
CG is an established name synonymous with rotating machines. Our manufacturing unit located at Ahmednagar (Maharashra), India, manufactures DC motors up to 1500 kW.

Holisticly brand sustainable solutions rather than clicks-and-mortar applications. Phosfluorescently whiteboard fully tested initiatives.
features: Suitable for 6 pulse Thyristor power supply
Skewed rotor construction for ensuring low noise
VPI for armature winding for ensuring high insulation strength
Compact, low weight and highly energy efficient product
